title: Zachary Swart’s Resume
text:
swa21007@byui.edu | www.linkedin.com/in/zacharyswart



B.S. in Business Analytics – Full Time
Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, ID
Jan 2024 – Jan 2028
- Overall GPA: 3.93
- Relevant Courses: Databases (SQL), Spreadsheet Analysis (Excel), & Business Analytics (Power BI).
- BYU-Idaho Academic Scholarship
Colony High School
2017 – 2021



SQL Teaching Assistant – Part Time
Brigham Young University – Idaho, Rexburg, ID
Apr 2025 – Present
- Provides database querying, data manipulation, and analysis techniques through hands-on support and tutoring.
- Instructed 15+ students in SQL through in-class sessions, covering key topics such as JOINs, REGEXPs, CASE statements, window functions, aggregate functions, and subqueries.
- Redesigned 4 exams to better align with course objectives and emphasize real-world SQL application scenarios.
Career Success Mentor – Part Time
Brigham Young University – Idaho, Rexburg, ID
Jan 2025 – Present
- Provides career support services, resume reviews, and job search assistance to thousands of students worldwide.
- Achieved 98.1% average customer satisfaction rating in post-appointment surveys.
- Mentored 150+ students by leading individualized mentorship sessions and tailoring support strategies for internship and job goals.
Polaris – Intern
Polaris Inc., Rexburg, ID
Apr 2024 – Aug 2024
- Global leader in powersports, known for innovation and performance.
- Improved station time efficiency by 16% using Lean Six Sigma principles.
- Maintained 140–160 unit daily production with 99.5% on-time attendance, supporting team performance.



Volunteer Representative
Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, Colorado Springs, CO
Oct 2021 – Oct 2023
- Supported 200+ individuals through personalized lessons and service.
- Led weekly council meetings for teams of 5+, promoting collaboration and goal achievement.



Excel Data Tracker
Apr 2025 – May 2025
- Boosted data validation speed by 400% using automated Excel tools with VBA and macros to detect appointment entry errors.
BYU-Idaho Hackathon
Nov 2024
- Built functional SQL relational database in a team of 4 for a time management web app using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript during a 24-hour coding challenge.



Excel | MySQL | Power BI | Python | R | PowerPoint | Word | Office & Outlook | HTML | CSS
